title: Human Surfaceome Annotation
text: Cell Surface Protein Atlas (CSPA, https://wlab.ethz.ch/cspa/) profiled bunch cells using mass spec empirically determine proteins cell surface. proteins annotated : https://wlab.ethz.ch/cspa/data/S2_File.xlsx Note: appears S2_File.xlsx identical pone.0121314.s003.xlsx publication. file consists three different sheets. publication: sheet interest Sheet (called ‘Table ’ spreadsheet).
code: S2 File: CSPA validated surfaceome proteins. Excel file containing all human and mouse surfaceome proteins in two tables and an additional table with all identified N-glycopeptides. A. List of 1492 human surfaceome proteins and their annotation. B. List of 1296 mouse surfaceome proteins and their annotation. C. List of 13942 mouse and human derived N-glycopeptides, including identified modified form.
